tool.name: Scanpy RunTSNE
tool.command: ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-run-tsne #if $use_rep != "auto" --use-rep '${use_rep}' #end if #if $key_added --key-added '${key_added}' #end if #if $embeddings --export-embedding embeddings.csv #end if #if $settings.default == "false" #if $settings.perplexity_file --perplexity \$( cat $settings.perplexity_file ) #else --perplexity '${settings.perplexity}' #end if --early-exaggeration '${settings.early_exaggeration}' --learning-rate '${settings.learning_rate}' #if $settings.n_pc --n-pcs ${settings.n_pc} #end if #if not $settings.fast_tsne --no-fast-tsne #end if #if $settings.n_job --n-jobs ${settings.n_job} #end if #if $settings.random_seed is not None --random-state ${settings.random_seed} #end if #end if @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@

param.name: use_rep
param.label: Use the indicated representation
param.option: Automatically chosen based on problem size

param.name: key_added
param.label: Additional suffix to the name of the slot to save the embedding

param.name: perplexity
param.label: The perplexity is related to the number of nearest neighbours, select a value between 5 and 50

param.name: perplexity_file
param.label: The perplexity is related to the number of nearest neighbours
param.help: For use with the parameter iterator. Overrides the persplexity option above

param.name: early_exaggeration
param.label: Controls the tightness within and between clusters

param.name: learning_rate
param.label: Learning rate, should be between 100 and 1000

param.name: fast_tsne
param.label: Use multicoreTSNE
param.help: Depending on the setup and version, the availability of the needed library might vary and hence fail.

param.name: n_pc
param.label: The number of PCs to use
